messages.title: A strong voice for BRITAIN
messages.content: A vote for Bernard is a vote for continuing economic recovery, better public services at lower cost, more personal and family responsibility, a secure Britain: strong, independent and free, a strong voice for you in Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bernard advocates for continuing economic recovery.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Better public services at lower cost
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bernard supports better public services at lower cost.
Bernard promotes more personal and family responsibility.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A secure Britain: strong, independent and free
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bernard aims for a secure Britain that is strong, independent and free.

politicalExperience.achievements: Bernard has been involved with various local community projects including securing approval for a new GP Surgery and thwarting illegal travellers' encampment.

images.caption: Bernard Jenkin pictured in various community engagement activities and locales within the constituency.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Bernard Jenkin has shown a strong track record of work and public service in the local community, with several specific instances and achievements highlighted throughout the leaflet.
